meanings: even though, even if, although, however, no matter (who, what, whom), regardless of, never mind

examples.korean: Environment departments and local conservation organizations, if they exist, only have small numbers of staff that are stretched very thinly. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 환경부처와 지역 환경단체들(없지만, 있다할 지라도)은 직원이 불과 몇명 안되고 업무량도 과다하다. examples.english: Environment departments and local conservation organizations, if they exist, only have small numbers of staff that are stretched very thinly. Add to Wordbook
